.. _intro:

highres
=======

.. figure:: https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/i/ud9pn9tdo5txv5mvwppo.png
   :alt: highres

About
-----
A script to download hi-resolution images using google search by image feature.

Table of Contents
-----------------

* Getting Started
* Prerequisites
* :ref:`Usage <usage>`
* License
* :ref:`Contact <contact>`

Getting Started
---------------

Prerequisites
-------------

List of items needed for highres to work

* A Browser: Chrome Firefox Edge Safari
* Webdriver: Chrome Firefox Edge Safari
* Added WebDriver's folder path to System Path

Installation
------------

pip install highres 

.. _usage:

Usage
-----

.. admonition:: command!

   C:\\>highres C:\\users\\dr\\Pictures\\example\\



Demo
----

.. raw:: html

   <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/GjR0mbHcMSg" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
